title: General Atlantic-backed KFin Tech files draft paper for Rs 2,400 crore-IPO - Economic Times
content: General Atlantic-backed KFin Tech files draft paper for Rs 2,400 crore-IPO  Economic Times
description: KFin Technologies is majority owned by funds managed by General Atlantic, a leading global private equity investor, which holds a stake of 74.94 per cent. Kotak Mahindra Bank acquired a 9.98 per cent stake in KFin Technologies in 2021.
